name: Munstah! Chase
description:
ToJAM game made in 3 days. You are a Munstah and - apart from chasing the marauding crusader - have to keep on top of the Munstah food chain and eat (and not get eaten) by your fellow Munstahs!

Gameplay video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CPwpn8hcsBc&list=UUdocxgq9k2CvNx8evW_5YUw

Gamepad

Y - jump (small Munstah)

X - eat (Mid and Big Munstahs)

Keyboard:

Left/Right arrow keys - move side to side

Z, X, C to brake, jump, and eat

Chasing, strategy, burps, and good fun.

Enjoy
